price: ߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
